data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module extends the functionality of the CGI::Session
    serializers
    (CGI::Session::Serialize::{Default,Storable,FreezeThaw}). This
    module is a time saver when people want to dump their session
    information out to a file/db/etc but don't want the data objects to
    be easily read from the command line.
